solution_line_template: Since {women_in_meeting} women are {women_percentage_reduction_value}% of the total number of women working there, that means there are {women_in_meeting}*{multiplier}= <<{women_in_meeting}*{multiplier}={total_women}>>{total_women} women working there in total.

Since there are an even number of women and men working in the office, that means there are {total_women}*{sexes_count}= <<{total_women}*{sexes_count}={total_people}>>{total_people} people working there in total, since there are {sexes_count} sexes.
